```{r}
sim_mean_sd = function(n, mu = 0, sigma = 5) {
  sim_data = tibble(
    x = rnorm(n, mean = mu, sd = sigma),
)
  sim_data |>
    summarize(
      mu_hat = mean(x),
      #sigma_hat = sd(x),
    )
}

sim_results_df =
  expand_grid(
    sample_size = 30,
    iter = 1:5000
  ) |>
  mutate(
    estimate_df = map(sample_size, sim_mean_sd)
  ) |>
  unnest(estimate_df)
```
